endpoints.description: Retrieve the current state of pharmacy inventory including stock levels and expiry dates.
Add new pharmaceutical items and records to the inventory database.
Update details of a specific inventory item such as quantity or expiration date.
Remove a specific item record from the inventory database.
Generate and retrieve insights and trends on inventory turnover and waste.
Set or update dynamic thresholds for inventory levels based on predicted demand.
Retrieve current thresholds configured for inventory management.
Retrieve a list of active alerts including low stock and expiration warnings.
Manually create or trigger alerts related to inventory issues.
Resolve or update the status of a specific inventory alert.
